name: LawnMower
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is my submission to the Spring 2D Jam 2022

------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game you play as a an lawnmower trying to cut the grass in the shortest time possible.
Mow at least 80% of the lawn and return to the start!
Controls:
Space - Accelerate
Left Shift - Boost
Right/Left arrow - Turn
M - Mute
Escape - Pause
Good luck!
